posts.post_content: Lajoie Portrait Piedmont 150 PSA-1. Asking $375...REDUCED TO $335 now via PayPal F&F. Card has significant paper loss(light scratches) but displays very nice for the grade. Centering and vivid registration help the eye appeal of this hot card in the Hobby. Please message me if you are interested or would like more detailed photos.

Close up of front. Thanks for looking!
-Mike
